octeon_mmio Struct Reference

#include <octeon_device.h>

Detailed Description

PCI address space mapping information.

Each of the 3 address spaces given by BAR0, BAR2 and BAR4 of Octeon gets mapped to different physical address spaces in the kernel.

Definition at line 188 of file octeon_device.h.

Data Fields

unsigned long start
 PCI address to which the BAR is mapped.
unsigned long len
 Length of this PCI address space.

 Length that has been mapped to phys.
void * hw_addr
 The physical address to which the PCI address space is mapped.
int done
 Flag indicating the mapping was successful.
